sermons.title: (A Living Challenge) A Living Challenge for a Dying Church
(A Living Challenge) How Badly Do You Want It?
Brokenness
sermons.description: This message beautifully and powerfully illustrates what brokenness is, and how it operates in the lives of those who choose to walk in it. Brother Dale gives clear, practical instruction in how to discern the difference between a broken and an unbroken person and leaves the listener challenged to a more godly life in Christ Jesus.

sermons.title: Jesus Christ Is Lord
sermons.description: This message takes a deep look at how Jesus must be the Lord of all in the believer's life before his faith can become practical. A message on consecration in the Christian's life and service for God.

sermons.title: Separation From the World (Part 1)
sermons.description: This message gives practical teaching on how to let God perfect holiness in our lives, and how to have Holy Ghost discernment in the specific issues with which our hearts and lives are challenged.

sermons.title: Separation From the World (Part 2)
sermons.description: This message in the series by Brother Dale Gish continues on with some practical teaching on Jesus being Lord of all. It addresses more specific areas such as clothing, and the laws of sowing and reaping. Very clear direction and insight is given on using discernment aided by the Holy Ghost.
